# CameraRegionView.PixelBufferProcessingContext

**Structure**

A context which provides the pixel buffer for a passthrough frame.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PixelBufferProcessingContext
```

## Specifying the context properties

- **pixelBuffer**: The pixel buffer of the passthrough frame.
- **timestamp**: The timestamp of the update.

items.description: The pixel buffer of the passthrough frame.
